WRITING.TEXT: Im late as hell, but when i was a kid i lived in a house that had woods right next to them, legit 20 meteres or so from the left side of our house. My brothers and i would often explore it along with our bestfriend who was also our neighbour. Well one day it was me, my older brother, and neighbour. I remember we got some type of lightsaber looking toys and were excited to play with them in the woods. Well were walking when all of a sudden we see a hunter, dressed on old looking hunting gear which seemed extremely odd i forget the weapon he was carrying but we froze and stared at eachother for quite sometime. All of a sudden he started sprinting towards us and we were sprinting the fuck out of there, all i remember is seeing him get stuck in some old rusty animal trap and start yelling in pain. When i returned sometime later the trap was still there extemely rusty. I have no idea what to make of the situation. I know over the years the the memory changed and everything may not be 100% accurate but my brother remembers it as well.
I wanna know what you did but i feel like its better if i didnt know lol
